root.name: Horace Goes Skiing
root.description: OverviewHorace during the skiing part of the game. Horace Goes Skiing was the sequel to the popular Hungry Horace. Gameplay was split into two distinct parts: the first, essentially a Frogger clone, saw the player having to manoeuvre Horace across a busy road to purchase skis from a shop and then cross back again. The second part of the game saw Horace having to ski down a tricky slalom course.
